channel.title: NYS:COP on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Toxic Shale Drilling Wastewater Threatens Top Oil Fields, Texas Agency Warns
item.description: A Texas agency overseeing 13 million acres of state land is warning that toxic waste fluid from shale drilling threatens to contaminate oil wells in North America’s most prolific crude basin.

item.title: Toxic Shale Drilling Wastewater Threatens Top Oil Fields, Texas Agency Warns
item.description: A Texas agency overseeing 13 million acres of state land is warning that toxic waste fluid from shale drilling threatens to contaminate oil wells in North America’s most prolific crude basin.

item.title: ConocoPhillips Nears $1.3 Billion Asset Sale to Flywheel Energy
item.description: ConocoPhillips is in advanced talks to sell some of its Oklahoma assets to closely held Flywheel Energy LLC for around $1.3 billion, as it streamlines its portfolio, people familiar with the matter sa
